abstract: In 2010, the average salary in the securities industry in New York City was five and a half times the average salary in the rest of the private sector in the city. In 1981, the ratio was two to one.
snippet: In 2010, the average salary in the securities industry in New York City was five and a half times the average salary in the rest of the private sector in the city. In 1981, the ratio was two to one.
lead_paragraph: Why are the Occupy Wall Streeters so angry at bankers? This chart might give you some idea:
